Schuttelaar & Partners | Web Developer for a Healthy World | The Hague, NL | ONSITE https://www.schuttelaar-partners.com/vacancies/development/w...

You are not just any developer. You work for a cause. That is a healthy and sustainable world. As a developer at Schuttelaar & Partners you'll work with fifty expert consultants on food, health and sustainability. For a broad spectrum of projects and clients â€” from sprouting local initiatives to big impact projects with multinationals. Do you want to code for your ideals? Then send me an email!
